description: Try our easy to follow Sandwich Platter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sandwich Platter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a mixture of wholemeal and white bread, make a platter of sandwiches with favourite fillings. We used: cooked chicken mixed with mayonnaise; soft lettuce and boiled egg; vegemite and cheese; ham and hummus. Cut sandwiches using a dinosaurshape and round cutter. Chill until serving.
